en.partage-message: The address of the current planetary system has been copied in the clipboard.
en.genese-description: A new universe was generated. Previously visited systems are no longer accessible.
en.erreur-systeme-different: A different system from the requested one was reached.
en.erreur-systeme-non-atteint: The requested system couldn't be reached.
en.erreur-partage: An error prevents sharing the system.
en.decouverte-planete-anneaux-description: You found a planet surrounded by rings of ice and dust.
en.decouverte-lune-interanneaux-description: You found a planet where one of the rings, under its own gravity, condensed into a moon.
en.decouverte-planete-lunes-description: You found a planet surrounded by multiple moons in orbital resonance: each moon completes its orbit twice as fast as the next moon.
en.decouverte-etoile-binaire-description: You found a system orbiting two stars.
en.decouverte-etoile-neutrons-description: You found a system orbiting a neutron star, remains of a star after the collapse of its core.
en.decouverte-trounoir-description: You found a system deprived of light, because its star collapsed into a black hole.
en.decouverte-trounoir-anneau-description: You found a system orbiting a black hole surrounded by a disk of matter rotating so fast it shines like a star.
en.decouverte-sphere-dyson-description: An advanced civilisation built a gigantic structure around its star to capture enormous quantities of solar energy.
